name: RISE (itch) (Riscvul)
description:
RISE is a platformer based around the idea of growing a community from the ashes of an apocalypse.

Sadly my goals were far too high for a Ludam Dare entry and it really only features the barebones of what I was shooting for.

Still I'm happy with the framework and platformer controls I created in such a limited time. I finally completed an LD entry.

Thank you for playing!

Arrow Keys to Move, E to Interact, Space to Jump

Free Music by Kevin MacLeod
